L2_gloss: The first letter of the Punjabi written in the Shahmukhi script.

a lot, abundant
‏میْرے کوْل بَتھیْرا اے کَہَݨ واسطے۔‎‎mere kol batherā ae kahaṇ vāst̤e.I have a lot to say.
to speak, say, ‏مَیْں انگریْزی نَئیں بوْلدا آں۔‎‎maiṉ
door, entrance, ‏کَمرے دا بُوْہا کھوْل دے زَرا۔‎‎kamre
brother, (informal) mister, sir; used to refer to any
The fourth letter of the Punjabi (Shahmukhi) abjad. It is preceded by پ and followed by ٹ
towel, ‏میْنُوْں توْلِیا دے دِیوْ‎ ― menūṉ toliyā de
net, (figuratively) trap, ‏اوْہ آپݨے جال وِچّ ہی پَھسّ
smoke, ‏شَہِر توں دُھوْاں آ رِہا وے۔‎‎śahir toṉ dhūāṉ
oh God!, ‏ہائے رَبّا!‎‎ ― hā'ē rabbā! ― Oh My God!
message, ‏اوْہْناں نے عَلِی نُوْں سُنیْہا بھیْجِیا۔‎‎ohnāṉ
at dawn, early tomorrow, in the morning, Synonym: صُبَح‎

injury, wound, hurt
‏اوْہ نُوْں سَٹّ لَگی اے۔‎‎oh nūṉ saṭṭ lagī ae.He's hurt himself.
clever, ‏بوْہْتا شوْخا نہ ہو۔‎‎bohtā śoxā na ho.Don't

new, ‏ایْہہ میرا نَواں یار اے۔‎‎eh merā navāṉ yar ae.This

to see, ‏مَیں اوہ نُوں نہیں ویکھ سَکدا۔‎‎ ― maiṉ avh
The fifth letter of the Punjabi (Shahmukhi) abjad. It is preceded by ت and followed by ث

tap, faucet
‏ٹُوْٹِی توں پاݨی لَے کے آ‎ṭūṭī toṉ pāṇī lai ke āBring some water from the tap
love, amour, romance, attachment, endearment, fondness,
song, ‏اے گانا بہوت وَدیا اے۔‎‎ae gānā bhot vadiya
to be, exist, to become, to happen
(rare) A letter of the Shahmukhi abjad, representing the retroflex nasal.
(rare) The thirty-second letter in the Shahmukhi Punjabi Alphabet, which is a combination of Lām and Diacritic Tāh (لؕ)

addiction, habit
ਅਮਲ ਇੱਕ ਰੋਗ ਹੈ।amala ikka rog hai.Addiction is a disease.
Synonym: ਨਸ਼ਾ (naśā)
genitive of ਇਹ (iha); his, her, its (proximal)
window, ਖਿੜਕੀ ਬੰਦ ਕਰੋ.khiṛkī band karo.Close the window.
to pull, ਇੱਥੇ ਖਿੱਚੋ. ― itthe khicco. ― Pull it here.,

complex
ਅਮਲ ਇੱਕ ਗੁੰਝਲ਼ਦਾਰ ਰੋਗ ਹੈ ।amal ikka guñjhḷadāra rog hai.Addiction is a complex disease.
